keyword: how many calories are in soda crackers
title: How Many Calories Are in Soda Crackers?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in soda crackers per 100g, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and full nutrition facts for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Soda Crackers?
assumptions: Plain baked soda crackers (like saltines), no added toppings, fats, or seasonings; standard commercial variety.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, and serving size; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: Soda crackers contain about 418 kcal per 100g, with high carbs and moderate sodium.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Top with 1 oz cheddar cheese per 100g

faqs.q: How many calories are in one soda cracker?
faqs.a: About 4-5 kcal per single soda cracker (assuming ~12g each).

faqs.q: What are the carbs in soda crackers?
faqs.a: Around 74g carbs per 100g, mostly from refined flour.

faqs.q: Are soda crackers high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, approximately 1265mg sodium per 100g due to added salt.

faqs.q: How much protein in soda crackers?
faqs.a: About 9g protein per 100g, from wheat flour.
